Yuxiang Ji

About Me

Hi, there! I am Yuxiang Ji (å§¬ç…œç¿”). I currently study as a Ph.D. student in Xiamen University, supervised by Prof Liaoni Wu, and Prof Yancheng You. I am interested with computer vision and multimodal research for UAVs, especially the generation and utilization of synthetic images. Previously, I worked as an AI engineer at Huawei Camera group. I obtained my Master degree in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from the University of Birmingham under the guidance of Prof Shuo Wang.
